channel.title: [PI] Skills object help. *Modified*
channel.description:
How do I make [code]c.getPA().addSkillXP(exprate * Config.EXP_EXPERIENCE, skill);[/code] to where it can use that for either cutting normal logs-magic logs, or crafting sapphire gems-dragonstone gems.
ANY HELP IS APPRECIATED!

item.title: [PI] Skills object help. *Modified*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:18, topic:461448”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=564387.msg4110244#msg4110244 date=1348440477]
You won’t just be able to paste that code in, compile and then run. You’ll have to change the itemids correctly.
[/quote]

yes and make sure my statements are correct, the config.firemaking experiance i kinda guessed how it goes. you can find it in config.java for the right statement[/quote]It’s all correct but here:

the skill “Firemaking” is supposed to be caped.
[size=24pt]EDIT:[/size]

is the only part it don’t recognize, “itemUsed”, “useWith”.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Skills object help. *Modified*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:13, topic:461448”]you are trying to do something like this?

if (itemUsed == tinderboxID || useWith == logid) c.getItems().deleteItem(logId, c.getItems().getItemSlot(logId), 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(AMOUNT-OF-XP * Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerfiremaking);[/quote]
Oh my Oh my, now if that would work that would be GREAT!
Let me figure out these errors on my other topic and I will go test it out thank you Sir!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,564696.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Skills object help. *Modified*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:8, topic:461448”]If you explained it more clearly, maybe people could give you some help. You want it to connect if a player cuts a log? What does that even mean…[/quote]Okay, let me retry this;

I want it to be like this:
PlayerClicksOn[LOGSID]WithTinderbox.addSkillXP(50 * Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFiremaking);

or

PlayerClicksOn[TREEID]CutTree…addSkillXP(50 * Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerWoodcutting); -etc.
